# catalystcenter_fabric_multicast (Data Source)

This data source can read the Fabric Multicast.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "catalystcenter_fabric_multicast" "example" {
  fabric_id            = "5e6f7b3a-2b0b-4a7d-8b1c-0d4b1cd5e1b1"
  virtual_network_name = "SDA_VN1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `fabric_id` (String) ID of the fabric to contain this anycast gateway
- `virtual_network_name` (String) Name of the layer 3 virtual network associated with the anycast gateway. the virtual network must have already been added to the site before creating an anycast gateway with it

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the object
- `ip_pool_name` (String) Name of the IP pool associated with the anycast gateway
- `ipv4_ssm_ranges` (List of String) IPv4 Source Specific Multicast (SSM) ranges
- `multicast_r_ps` (Attributes List) Multicast Rendezvous Points (RP). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--multicast_r_ps))

<a id="nestedatt--multicast_r_ps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `multicast_r_ps`

Read-Only:

- `network_device_ids` (List of String) IDs of the network devices%
- `rp_device_location` (String) Device location of the RP
